document_data.name: Tebora
document_data.mainbody: '''Tebora''' was the saleswoman at the [[Body Shop]] in [[Vaelan]] in {{yearlink|1374}}.{{cite book/Darkvision|109-113|11}}
document_data.Appearance: She was a [[plangent]], sporting the Strong and Tireless configuration, which replaced one of her legs, one of her arms, and her spine; she also sported a [[plangent crystal]] eye. When working at the Body Shop, she wore a lavender dress, which matched her prosthetics quite well.
document_data.Personality: She was an insistent and tricky seller, eager to demonstrate the capabilities and power of plangents.
document_data.Powers: Tebora's eye was capable of some kind of scanning. She was also confident of her ability to wrestle anyone's manservants.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1374}}, Tebora was the one answering the questions of [[Ususi Manaallin]] and [[Iahn Qoyllor]], who had entered the shop while disguised as Lady Urale and her manservant Alon (Iahn being the manservant). During her conversation, either [[Shaddon Datharathi]] or [[Pandorym]] looked out of Tebora's body without her notice or knowledge. She offered to wrestle "Alon" to demonstrate the power of her plangent prosthetics; his disguise broke in the violence, and he was forced to knock her out in order to keep their presence a secret.
